text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin-bb/CodeSystem/C4BBSurfaceCodes defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
M MesialThe surface of a tooth that is closest to the midline (middle) of the face.
O OcclusalThe chewing surface of posterior teeth.
I IncisalThe biting edge of anterior teeth.
D DistalThe surface of a tooth that faces away from the midline of the face.
B BuccalThe surface of a posterior tooth facing the cheeks.
F FacialThe surface of a tooth facing the lips.
L LingualThe surface of a tooth facing the tongue.
MO MesioclusalThe Mesioclusal surfaces of a tooth.
DO DistoclusalThe Distoclusal surfaces of a tooth.
DI DistoincisalThe Distoincisal surfaces of a tooth.
MOD MesioclusodistalThe Mesioclusodistal surfaces of a tooth.

name: C4BBSurfaceCodes
title: US Surface Codes System
description: This value set includes FDI tooth surface codes localized for the US Realm.

concept.definition: The surface of a tooth that is closest to the midline (middle) of the face.

The biting edge of anterior teeth.
The surface of a tooth that faces away from the midline of the face.
The surface of a posterior tooth facing the cheeks.
The surface of a tooth facing the lips.
The surface of a tooth facing the tongue.
The Mesioclusal surfaces of a tooth.
The Distoclusal surfaces of a tooth.
The Distoincisal surfaces of a tooth.
The Mesioclusodistal surfaces of a tooth.
